testcase.name: should return 200 when adding new user with correct data

should return 400 when adding user with empty email

should return 400 when adding user with existing email
should return 200 for getting existing user by id
should return 400 for getting un existing user by id
should return 200 for getting existing user by email
should return 400 for getting un existing user by email
